rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a foyer that includes storage and shoe racks, adhering to Vastu principles with the main door facing east. Dimensions: approximately 8x6 feet.

Open-plan living area combining living, dining and kitchen areas; designed for family activities and social gatherings. The layout ensures a clear view of the central courtyard from various vantage points.
Integrated open-plan kitchen with modern appliances and ample storage; positioned adjacent to dining area, ensuring efficient workflow as per Vastu guidelines.
A centrally located courtyard providing natural light and ventilation; it is landscaped with greenery and water features to enhance aesthetic appeal.

openings.description: Main door facing east, ensuring auspicious entry as per Vastu principles.
Large windows on living area and kitchen to allow abundant natural light while maintaining privacy. Windows placed in accordance with directional balance guidelines.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a balcony that overlooks the central courtyard for improved ventilation and view; designed to enhance privacy. Dimensions: approximately 15x12 feet.
Additional bedroom with a balcony offering outdoor space, ensuring each bedroom has its own private access. Dimensions: approximately 14x11 feet.
Third bedroom with a balcony that offers a panoramic view of the garden area. Dimensions: approximately 13x10 feet
Fourth bedroom featuring a well-designed balcony for fresh air and natural light, in keeping with Vastu guidelines on directional placement.

Windows strategically placed in each bedroom for optimal light while maintaining security as per local building norms.
